title: Im not getting any more keys
body:
Idk if its a punishment or something but im not getting keys anymore, i do get the chests though, but i legit didnt got keys in like 20 games in a row, nothing...
Please i need help

replies.body: You can only earn up to 12 [**key fragments**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) within a months time. Once you come up on the 4th week after getting that first key, you'll be able to get another. Think of each key slot as having a cooldown of 4 weeks. Once that time is up you can get another, but you will still need to wait for the next cooldown to end.
